filmography.title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
filmography.role_description: One of the seven townswomen abducted by the Pontipee brothers; a confident, energetic bride who participates in the famous barn-raising dance.
filmography.plot: In 1850s Oregon, Adam Pontipee brings his new bride home to his six roughneck brothers, who decide to kidnap six local girls to be their own wives.
filmography.awards: AFI: Greatest Movie Musicals (#21); Oscar: Win – Best Scoring of a Musical Picture

filmography.title: The Band Wagon
filmography.role_description: A featured dancer and model in the 'Girl Hunt Ballet' sequence, showcasing her statuesque height and dancing ability.
filmography.plot: An aging musical star hopes to revitalize his career in a Broadway show, but clashes with the pretentious director and the prima ballerina.
filmography.awards: AFI: Greatest Movie Musicals (#17); National Film Registry: Inducted (1995)

filmography.title: Li'l Abner
filmography.role_description: A silent but stunningly attractive woman whose mere presence freezes men in their tracks, a role she originated on Broadway.
filmography.plot: When their town is declared the most unnecessary place in America and slated for nuclear testing, the citizens of Dogpatch must prove their worth.

filmography.title: The Marriage-Go-Round
filmography.role_description: A brilliant and beautiful Swedish blonde who attempts to seduce a married professor so she can have a child with his intellect and her physique.
filmography.plot: A happily married professor's life is turned upside down when a Swedish houseguest decides she wants him to father her 'perfect' child.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nominated – Best Supporting Actress; Tony Award: Win (for the stage play version)

filmography.title: Mackenna's Gold
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, silent Apache warrior woman who is part of an outlaw gang and violently jealous of the protagonist's love interest.
filmography.plot: A marshal is kidnapped by an outlaw who forces him to lead a group of treasure hunters to a legendary canyon of gold guarded by Apache spirits.

filmography.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
filmography.role_description: Newmar reprises her iconic voice role as the Feline Femme Fatale, teaming up with (and then betraying) Batman and Robin.
filmography.plot: Batman and Robin spring into action when Gotham City is threatened by a quartet of their most fiendish foes: Penguin, The Joker, Riddler, and Catwoman.

filmography.title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself, the idol and spiritual guide of the drag queen protagonists who carry her autographed photo.
filmography.plot: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town where they help the locals find their spirit.

filmography.title: Batman vs. Two-Face
filmography.role_description: Newmar voices Catwoman again in this animated sequel, aiding Batman against the dual threat of Harvey Dent.
filmography.plot: Batman and Robin must stop a crime wave led by the disfigured district attorney Two-Face, who has discovered Batman's secret identity.

filmography.title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
filmography.role_description: A featured exotic dancer in the court of Emperor Caligula in this biblical epic sequel to 'The Robe'.
filmography.plot: A Christian slave is sentenced to fight in the Roman arena as a gladiator, where his faith is tested by the corrupt Emperor Caligula and the seductive Messalina.

filmography.title: Serpent of the Nile
filmography.role_description: A memorably visual role as a dancer completely covered in gold paint performing for Cleopatra and Mark Antony.
filmography.plot: The story of the Egyptian Queen Cleopatra and her romance with Roman General Mark Antony, leading to their tragic downfall.

filmography.title: Slaves of Babylon
filmography.role_description: An early role as a lethal dancer involved in court intrigue in this biblical adventure film.
filmography.plot: After the Babylonians conquer Jerusalem, the prophet Daniel and a shepherd named Cyrus work to free the Israelites from captivity.

filmography.title: The Rookie
filmography.role_description: A glamorous movie starlet and girlfriend of a tough sergeant, who becomes the object of affection for a bumbling rookie soldier.
filmography.plot: A mishap at the draft board sends a radio page to boot camp just as WWII ends, where he falls for his sergeant's movie star girlfriend.

filmography.title: The Maltese Bippy
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, possibly vampiric member of the eccentric Ravenswood family living next to a cemetery.
filmography.plot: Two producers of low-budget films become suspects in a murder case and get tangled up with a strange family living in a spooky mansion.

filmography.title: For Love or Money
filmography.role_description: One of three wealthy sisters, a fitness-obsessed health nut whom a lawyer tries to matchmake with an IRS agent.
filmography.plot: A lawyer is hired by a wealthy widow to find husbands for her three daughters, but complications arise when he falls for one of them.

filmography.title: Hysterical
filmography.role_description: The ghost of a woman who committed suicide 100 years ago, now haunting a lighthouse and seducing a writer to resurrect her dead lover.
filmography.plot: A writer retreats to a lighthouse for inspiration, only to be haunted by ghosts and zombies in this spoof of horror films.

filmography.title: Streetwalkin'
filmography.role_description: A tough, veteran prostitute who rules the streets and becomes an unlikely ally to a young runaway trying to survive.
filmography.plot: A teenage girl runs away from home to New York City and falls into the hands of a violent pimp, struggling to escape the life of prostitution.

filmography.title: Deep Space
filmography.role_description: A psychic woman who assists police detectives in tracking down a murderous alien creature loose in Los Angeles.
filmography.plot: Detectives hunt a biological weapon created by the military that has crashed to Earth and mutated into a flesh-eating monster.

filmography.title: Ghosts Can't Do It
filmography.role_description: A guardian angel who attempts to guide the ghost of a wealthy man as he tries to find a new body to inhabit.
filmography.plot: A man commits suicide to return as a ghost and help his much younger wife find a suitable young man for him to possess so they can make love again.
filmography.awards: Razzie Award: Win – Worst Supporting Actor (Donald Trump)

filmography.title: Evils of the Night
filmography.role_description: An alien scientist involved in a plot to harvest the blood of teenagers to keep her aging extraterrestrial cohorts young.
filmography.plot: Teenagers camping by a lake are abducted by aliens who need their blood to maintain their youth.

filmography.title: Oblivion
filmography.role_description: The madam of a saloon in a futuristic, western-themed alien town, acting as a confidante to the town's cyborg deputy.
filmography.plot: In a frontier town on an alien planet, the son of a murdered sheriff must face down a reptilian outlaw to save the town.

filmography.title: Oblivion 2: Backlash
filmography.role_description: Newmar reprises her role as the saloon owner in this sequel, helping to defend the town against a new bounty hunter threat.
filmography.plot: A bounty hunter arrives in the town of Oblivion to claim a reward on a wanted outlaw, leading to more chaos in the space-western settlement.

filmography.title: Nudity Required
filmography.role_description: A comedic role as a casting director or industry figure in this spoof about the seedier side of Hollywood filmmaking.
filmography.plot: Two friends pretend to be big-shot movie producers to trick aspiring actresses into auditioning for non-existent roles.

filmography.title: Cyber-C.H.I.C.
filmography.role_description: A scientist or handler involved in the creation of a female cyborg law enforcement officer.
filmography.plot: A female cyborg police officer is created to stop a madman who is threatening the world with nuclear destruction.

filmography.title: Love Scenes
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this romantic drama about an actress struggling to balance her career and personal life.
filmography.plot: An actress lands a role in a movie but finds her relationship with her husband strained by the demands of the film's director.

filmography.title: She's Working Her Way Through College
filmography.role_description: One of Newmar's earliest screen appearances as a dancer, showcasing the skills that would later land her bigger musical roles.
filmography.plot: A burlesque dancer enrolls in college to become a writer, but her past threatens to expose her and the professor who helps her.

filmography.title: The I Don't Care Girl
filmography.role_description: An uncredited role as a showgirl in this musical biography of Eva Tanguay.
filmography.plot: A film producer recounts the life and career of vaudeville star Eva Tanguay to convince his studio to make a movie about her.
